an7.62:4.1: * “Mā, bhikkhave, puññānaṃ bhāyittha.
an7.62:4.2: Sukhassetaṃ, bhikkhave, adhivacanaṃ yadidaṃ puññāni.
an7.62:4.3: Abhijānāmi kho panāhaṃ, bhikkhave, dīgharattaṃ katānaṃ puññānaṃ dīgharattaṃ iṭṭhaṃ kantaṃ manāpaṃ vipākaṃ paccanubhūtaṃ.
an7.62:4.4: Satta vassāni mettacittaṃ bhāvesiṃ.
an7.62:4.5: Satta vassāni mettacittaṃ bhāvetvā satta saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappe nayimaṃ lokaṃ punāgamāsiṃ.
an7.62:4.6: Saṃvaṭṭamāne sudāhaṃ, bhikkhave, loke ābhassarūpago homi, vivaṭṭamāne loke suññaṃ brahmavimānaṃ upapajjāmi.
an7.62:5.1: Tatra sudaṃ, bhikkhave, brahmā homi mahābrahmā abhibhū anabhibhūto aññadatthudaso vasavattī.
an7.62:5.2: Chattiṃsakkhattuṃ kho panāhaṃ, bhikkhave, sakko ahosiṃ devānamindo;
an7.62:5.3: anekasatakkhattuṃ rājā ahosiṃ cakkavattī dhammiko dhammarājā cāturanto vijitāvī janapadatthāvariyappatto sattaratanasamannāgato.
an7.62:5.4: Tassa mayhaṃ, bhikkhave, imāni satta ratanāni ahesuṃ, seyyathidaṃ—
an7.62:5.5: cakkaratanaṃ, hatthiratanaṃ, assaratanaṃ, maṇiratanaṃ, itthiratanaṃ, gahapatiratanaṃ, pariṇāyakaratanameva sattamaṃ.
an7.62:5.6: Parosahassaṃ kho pana me, bhikkhave, puttā ahesuṃ sūrā vīraṅgarūpā parasenappamaddanā.
an7.62:5.7: So imaṃ pathaviṃ sāgarapariyantaṃ adaṇḍena asatthena dhammena abhivijiya ajjhāvasinti.
an7.62:6.2: Kusalānaṃ sukhesino;
an7.62:6.4: Satta vassāni bhikkhavo;
an7.62:6.6: Nayimaṃ lokaṃ punāgamiṃ.
